overview.en: GCAC is a public chain based on the DDPOS consensus mechanism. In the future, it will create a blockchain-wide ecosystem that covers the global gold light luxury goods trading platform + mining alliance digital exchange + mining alliance digital bank.
overview.zh: GCAC是一条基于DDPOS共识机制的公有链，未来将打造涵盖全球黄金轻奢品交易平台+矿业联盟数字交易所+矿业联盟数字银行的区块链全领域生态。
